organization.$: Laboratory of Image Sciences and Technology

head.citation-title: Robust color face recognition algorithm based on local features and ensemble learning
head.abstracts: Â©, 2015, Southeast University. All right reserved.To make full use of local information of face images and improve the recognition rate of the existing color face recognition algorithm based on global features, a robust color face recognition algorithm based on local features and ensemble learning classifier is proposed. In the feature extraction stage, the adaptive quaternion pseudo-Zernike moments (AQPZMs) are used to describe the features of image blocks. The features of image blocks with larger entropy are described by quaternion pseudo-Zernike moments (QPZMs) with higher order. On the contrary, the QPZMs with lower order are used to describe the features of image blocks with smaller entropy. In the classification stage, the ensemble learning classifier is used for identification. The experimental results of different color face datasets show that compared with the recognition algorithms exploiting QPZMs or quaternion two-dimensional principal component analysis (Q2DPCA) to extract global features, the proposed algorithm can achieve higher accuracy when the face images are affected by the factors such as illumination, facial expression and so on.

coredata.dc:description: To make full use of local information of face images and improve the recognition rate of the existing color face recognition algorithm based on global features, a robust color face recognition algorithm based on local features and ensemble learning classifier is proposed. In the feature extraction stage, the adaptive quaternion pseudo-Zernike moments (AQPZMs) are used to describe the features of image blocks. The features of image blocks with larger entropy are described by quaternion pseudo-Zernike moments (QPZMs) with higher order. On the contrary, the QPZMs with lower order are used to describe the features of image blocks with smaller entropy. In the classification stage, the ensemble learning classifier is used for identification. The experimental results of different color face datasets show that compared with the recognition algorithms exploiting QPZMs or quaternion two-dimensional principal component analysis (Q2DPCA) to extract global features, the proposed algorithm can achieve higher accuracy when the face images are affected by the factors such as illumination, facial expression and so on.
